metadata.dc:author: Villanueva, Xabier
González-Rocha, Gerardo
Domínguez, Mariana
Bello-Toledo, Helia
Opazo-Capurro, Andrés
Quezada-Aguiluz, Mario
metadata.dc:description: Currently, there is a controversy in how to determine the minimal inhibitory concentration (MIC) of colistin against Acinetobacter baumannii. We compared three methods, concluding that the addition of Tween-80 (0.002%) to Müller-Hinton broth in the microdilution method could improve MIC determination and it could reduce false resistance.
metadata.dc:title: ¿Se debe revisar la determinación de la CIM de colistín en Acinetobacter baumannii?
[The colistin MIC determination in Acinetobacter baumannii, Should it be reviewed?]
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista chilena de infectologia : organo oficial de la Sociedad Chilena de Infectologia
